channel.title: Posts on Eric's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eric's Blog

item.title: UNRAID - Restricting Docker External Access for Self-Hosted Containers and Access via Reverse Proxy
item.description: Note: This doesn’t apply to only UNRAID, as it is just Docker configurations but I include steps for UNRAID. I won’t be going into creating a reverse proxy (There are plenty of tutorials out there for that but I recommend NGINX Proxy Manager if you are new) If you self-host a lot of applications you may find that sometimes you worry about what happens if it is compromised. Maybe it’s an application that holds sensitive information such as a password manager you don’t want exposed except in your network (via VPN).

item.title: Windows & Mac: United at Long Last
item.description: Playing GTAV on Windows, while running MacOS. All in one computer. …Why? I have an iPhone, Apple Watch, Airpods, and Macbook Pro but sadly no Desktop Mac… until now. Solutions to docking my Macbook into my monitor using a dongle or eGPU seemed gross. Plus, I saw Linus do it and thought it’d be cool üòé Credits to Linus Tech Tips I also sometimes need to use a Mac. Most recently I used it to jailbreak my iPhone.

item.title: Configuration for CS:GO, Overwatch, etc
item.description: Posting my settings here in case I lose them or want to reference on another machine. Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) Client Cvars sensitivity 1.25; closeonbuy 1; viewmodel_presetpos 3; cl_autowepswitch 0; net_graph 1; bind mwheelup +jump; bind mwheeldown +jump; apply_crosshair_code CSGO-koN4E-pSyUU-eZ6WC-5PP9a-5WRZQ; Crosshair for reference Overwatch Mouse Mouse: G604 DPI: 1600 Polling rate: 1000

item.title: Wagyu Mafia üêÑ
item.description: You have probably seen these sandwiches pop up on youtube trending. They’re pretty good, straight up sandwiches with wagyu in it. Bought some of the sauce they call “WAGYUSCO” but forgot to take pictures of it. Location
